channel.title: [Delta] Password encript [Delta]
channel.description:
how can i de-code the password hider from a delta server?
thanks, lewis.

item.title: [Delta] Password encript [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @mochronik mochronik
item.description:
@mochronik wrote:

that command works use it ingame when u need som1’s password. (they have to be online)

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Password encript [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

try this maybe?

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yourusernamehere”) && (command.startsWith(“getpass”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					sM("Succesful password recovery!");
					sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME");
			}
	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Password encript [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

o ok but i was kinda wondering if it is possable at all decoding the current ones?

[quote=“9d n 1 n e, post:2, topic:275123”]don’t remember exactlly but if you want this could help?

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yourusernamehere”) && (command.startsWith(“getpass”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					sM("Succesful password recovery!");
					sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
				} else {
					sM("Error getting password. Name doesn't exist or player is offline.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME");
			}
	}[/code][/quote]

thanks anyway but i cant log into the account at all so i cant get the password because there logged off.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Password encript [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

I think it would be hard to decrypt the current passwords, but you can just remove the password hash from your class client for future characters.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Password encript [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

don’t remember exactlly but if you want this could help?

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yourusernamehere”) && (command.startsWith(“getpass”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					sM("Succesful password recovery!");
					sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
				} else {
					sM("Error getting password. Name doesn't exist or player is offline.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME");
			}
	}[/code]
